name: trash-collector
description:
this was a simple game made in windows batch script, sorry to Linux or raspberry pi users, but it is one of the only scripts I know. it does not require anything else, you just need to open the file and you will get the game.

more information is in the game. sorry if it is too small of a game, but windows batch script is hard to use. 

this game is a part of Polymars' sea jam.

i am not really good at scripting, but i gave this jam my best effort. 

i am getting a raspberry pi zero, so i should be able to script on most linux operating systems soon.
